name: scoutradioz-primary
description: The primary HTTP Lambda function that serves most requests on Scoutradioz.

scripts.update: yarn && yarn upgrade --pattern 'scoutradioz*' && yarn run theme
scripts.---readme---: Use the win-X scripts if you're using Windows. Always upload to test or QA first, then extensively test before promoting to prod.
scripts.deploy-test: yarn compile-static && HASH=$(git rev-parse HEAD) sst deploy --stage test
scripts.deploy-qa: yarn check-working-tree-clean && yarn compile-static && HASH=$(git rev-parse HEAD) sst deploy --stage qa
scripts.deploy-prod: yarn check-working-tree-clean && yarn compile-static && HASH=$(git rev-parse HEAD) sst deploy --stage prod
scripts.sync-all: bun run sync-test && yarn run sync-qa && yarn run sync-prod
scripts.---readme3---: Scripts related to compiling static files from Typescript -> JS and LESS -> CSS.
scripts.compile-ts: echo 'Compiling TypeScript' && cd public-src && yarn && cd ts-bundled && npx tsc && cd ../ts && mv ../../public/js/bundle.d.ts .; npx tsc
scripts.compile-static: yarn run compile-less && yarn run compile-ts && yarn compile-svelte
scripts.check-working-tree-clean: if [ -n "$(git status --porcelain)" ]; then echo 'Working tree not clean! Aborting (Commit, stash, or revert your files!)'; exit 1; fi
